name: Kevin Levrone GOLD BCAA 2:1:1-30 servings
description:
Kevin Levrone GOLD BCAA 2:1:1-30 servings

GOLD BCAA 2:1:1. Food supplement. With sweeteners. A product that delivers branched-chain amino acids (BCAA) in 2:1:1 ratio, L-glutamine, citrulline malate, vitamins & electrolytes. The product is intended for people with increased physical activity.

Benefits

  • The high concentration of leucine has a positive effect on the functioning of the nervous system and reduces fatigue by increasing the ratio of bcaa to tryptophan
  • Facilitate quick muscle recovery after working out
  • Help build and protect the muscles from diminishment during weight loss
  • Ensures that your electrolytes are replaced as you sweat
  • Helps you maintain your edge through even the most intense workouts

Ingredients

BCAA complex (L-leucine, L-isoleucine, L-valine), L-glutamine, citrulline malate, vitamins and minerals premix [potassium citrate, magnesium citrate, sodium citrate, vitamin C (L-ascorbic acid), vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), vitamin B12 (cyanocobalamin)], flavourings, anti-caking agents, acidity regulators (malic acid, citric acid), colours, sweeteners (steviol glycosides, sucralose, acesulfame K). The measure included in the packet serves to facilitate portioning, but it does not guarantee precise dosing. It is advisable to use scales in order to measure out the exact amount.
short_description:
Kevin Levrone GOLD BCAA 2:1:1-30 servings

name: GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration
description:
GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration

Product description

FLEXX EAAs delivers all 9 Essential Amino Acids (EAAs) for complete muscle protein synthesis. The result: Muscle preservation, energy, enhanced endurance, and recovery. This total amino acid profile features 7g of EAAs, with 5g in the clinically preferred 2:1:1 ratio. For stress mitigation and improved vitality, it includes 125mg of the adaptogenic herb Sensoril Ashwagandha. Our amazing flavors provide hydration support that’s truly delicious, anytime: Pre, Intra, and Post-Workout. For the hard training athlete, FLEXX EAAs is the complete muscle and recovery solution.
short_description:
GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration

  • Essential Aminos – Each serving of Flexx EAAs contains 7g of Essential Amino Acids to help promote muscle protein synthesis
  • Adaptogen Driven Vitality Support – Flexx EAAs provides 125mg of Ashwagandha to help promote better Cortisol support
  • Enhanced Recovery – In addition to EAAs, each serving is packed with 5g of Branched Chain Amino Acids to support better recovery
  • Balanced Hydration – Coconut water provides a balanced mixture of minerals and electrolytes to support optimal hydration levels
  • Endurance Fuel – Flexx EAAs are perfect for any activity from weight lifting to hiking, bicycling and anything in between

name: RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 Powder Post Workout and Muscle Recovery - 30 Servings
description:
RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 , Lean Muscle Recovery - 30 Servings

Enhance Muscle Growth
BCAA supplementation paired with resistance training can lead to increased muscle protein synthesis and muscle growth.

Speed Up Recovery & Muscle Repair
BCAAs can reduce the breakdown of protein and muscle damage during exercise, thus protecting against muscle loss, decreasing soreness and speeding up muscle recovery.

Improve Athletic Performance
Supplementing with BCAAs as part of a resistance training program can result ion significant improvements in strength and performance.

Suggested Use

As a dietary supplement, take 1 scoop of BCAA 5000 Powder into 8-10 oz cold water, between meals, 30-45 minutes before workouts, and/or immediately after workouts. Consume 1 serving, 1-3 times daily.

Other Ingredients

Citric acid, maltodextrin, natural and artificial flavors, silica, sucralose, malic acid, acesulfame potassium, FD&C yellow #5, FD&C red #40.
short_description:
RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 , Lean Muscle Recovery – 225 gms

  • Clean Active Nutrition
  • 5g Instantized BCAA
  • lean Muscle Growth
  • Athletic Performance
  • Recovery
  • Natural & Artificial Flavor
  • Third-Party Tested
  • 30 Total Servings
  • Quality Assurance
  • Dietary Supplement

name: RSP Nutrition, Regan BCAA , (264 gms)
description:
RSP Nutrition, Regan BCAA , (264 gms)

BOOST MUSCLE RECOVERY & INCREASE ENDURANCE – BCAAs have been shown to promote muscular endurance, decrease fatigue, and improve muscle recovery by playing a key role in stimulating protein synthesis. They are part of an optimal and essential post-workout routine for any active individual looking to recover faster from training. PROMOTE LEAN MUSCLE GROWTH – RSP BCAA 5000 plays a critical role in stimulating protein synthesis which is the process responsible for muscle growth and recovery. Furthermore, BCAAs have also been shown to help preserve existing muscle tissue and play an important part in the maintenance of immune system function.

Benefits

RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 powder has been formulated using the research supported 2:1:1 BCAA ratio. BCAAs play a critical role in muscle protein synthesis and act as fuel during exercise. Not only is there scientific research supporting BCAAs for improving muscle recovery but they also have been shown to help preserve existing muscle tissue. Additionally, BCAAs play an important part in the maintenance of immune system function.

Ingredients

Citric acid, maltodextrin, natural and artificial flavours, silica, sucralose, malic acid, acesulfame k

Usage

  • As a dietary supplement, take 1 scoop of BCAA 5000 Powder blended into 8-10 oz water, between meals, 30-45 minutes before workouts, and/or immediately after workouts.
  • Consume 1 serving 1-3 times daily.
short_description:
RSP Nutrition, Regan BCAA , (264 gms)

  • Key Features:
    • Helps improve protein synthesis & nitrogen retention.
    • Accelerates muscle recovery and fatigue reduction.
    • Promotes lean muscle growth.

name: RSP Nutrition AminoLean, Pre Workout Amino Energy, Fat Burner - 30 Servings
description:
RSP Nutrition AminoLean, Pre Workout Amino Energy, Fat Burner - 30 Servings

  • Clean Active Nutrition
  • 5 g Essential Amino Acids
  • Weight Management
  • Mental Focus
  • Natural & Artificial Flavors
  • Zero Calories
  • Zero Sugar
  • 30 Total Servings
  • Third-Party Tested
  • Dietary Supplement
  • CarnoSyn® Carnosine Synthesize
  • InnovaTea®

RSP was born to help people achieve their health and fitness goals. We live to partner with you in achieving those goals. Whether you're a busy professional trying out a new fitness program or a lifelong athlete, we know this can be challenging. Our mission is to create nutritional products that make your journey both heathy and enjoyable, without ever asking you to choose between quality and convenience. So set a goal, fuel up, beat a personal best, recover and repeat. We have your back every step of the way.

Anytime Energy & Performance
125 mg natural caffeine from fermented tea leaves to support energy levels, focus and alertness.

Essential Amino Acids for Muscle Recovery
Comprehensive blend of essential amino acids to boost performance and support muscle development & repair.

Weight Management Support
CLA, Carnitine, Green Tea Extract and Green Coffee Extract promote weight management.

Suggested Use

Mix 2 scoops (1 serving) of AminoLean® in 8-10 oz of cold water anytime throughout the day.

Recommended Use:

For Anytime Energy & EAA's: Take 1 or more servings first thing in the morning and/or between meals.

For Pre-Workout & EAA's: Take 1-3 servings 20-30 minutes before training.

For Recovery & EAA's: Take 1-2 serving after training and/or between meals.

Do not exceed more than 6 scoops (3 servings) in a 4 hour period and do not exceed more than 8 scoops (4 servings) in a 24 hour period.

Other Ingredients

Citric acid, natural & artificial flavors, maltodextrin, sucralose, fiber blend (cellulose gum, xanthan gum, carrageenan), acesulfame potassium, FD&C red #40, FD&C blue #1
short_description:
RSP Nutrition AminoLean, Pre Workout

  • Essential amino acids to support lean muscle recovery
  • Bcaas to help build lean muscle
  • L-carnitine to increase metabolism and convert fat into energy
  • Provides anytime energy
  • Promotes weight management and fat burning
  • 0 Calories, 0 Sugars, 0 Carbohydrates

name: RSP Nutrition Glutamine Powder - 250 grams
description:
RSP Nutrition Glutamine, Pure Micronized Glutamine Powder for Recovery - 250 grams

  • LEAN MUSCLE AND OVERALL HEALTH - L-Glutamine is an essential amino acid that plays a crucial role in supporting lean muscle as well as supporting a variety of functions in the body such as digestion and the immune system.
  • MICRONIZED FOR ABSORPTION - RSP Nutrition L-Glutamine is micronized for maximal absorption and mixes effortlessly into your favorite beverage.
  • GLUTAN, GMO, AND BANNED SUBSTANCE FREE - Rest easy knowing that RSP Nutrition L-Glutamine is free of gluten, GMOs and banned substances.
  • Increase endurance

RSP was born to help people achieve their health and fitness goals. We live to partner with you in achieving those goals. Whether you're a busy professional trying out a new fitness program or a lifelong athlete, we know this can be challenging. Our mission is to create nutritional products that make your journey both healthy and enjoyable, without ever asking you to choose between quality and convenience. So set a goal, fuel up, beat a personal best, recover and repeat. We have your back every step of the way.

Lean muscle & overall health: The essential amino acid, L-Glutamine, plays a critical role in supporting lean muscle, as well as certain functions in the body such as digestion and the immune system.

100% pure glutamine: Each serving contains 5 g of premium micronized glutamine-no fillers-just the best quality glutamine. 

Suggested Use

Take one serving (1 scoop) mixed with 8-10 fl.oz of cold water (or other beverage of your choice) before, during or after training. On non-training days, take one serving (1 scoop) in the morning. Easily mixed and stacked with other products.
